code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={currentQuestion:0,shownQuestion:0,selectedChoice:-1,selectedChoices:[],isCorrect:-1,modalVisible:false,finishFlag:false,newQuiz:true};var reducers={SetCurrentQuestion:function SetCurrentQuestion(state,action){state.currentQuestion=action.payload;},SetShownQuestion:function SetShownQuestion(state,action){state.shownQuestion=action.payload;},SetSelectedChoice:function SetSelectedChoice(state,action){state.selectedChoice=action.payload;},SetSelectedChoices:function SetSelectedChoices(state,action){state.selectedChoices=action.payload;},SetModalVisible:function SetModalVisible(state,action){state.modalVisible=action.payload;},SetFinishFlag:function SetFinishFlag(state,action){state.finishFlag=action.payload;},SetIsCorrect:function SetIsCorrect(state,action){state.isCorrect=action.payload;},SetNewQuiz:function SetNewQuiz(state,action){state.newQuiz=action.payload;},ResetQuiz:function ResetQuiz(state){state.currentQuestion=0;state.shownQuestion=0;state.isCorrect=-1;state.selectedChoice=-1;state.selectedChoices=[];state.finishFlag=false;state.newQuiz=true;}};var quizSlice=createSlice({name:"quiz",initialState:initialState,reducers:reducers});var SetCurrentQuestion=quizSlice.actions.SetCurrentQuestion;export{SetCurrentQuestion};var SetShownQuestion=quizSlice.actions.SetShownQuestion;export{SetShownQuestion};var SetSelectedChoice=quizSlice.actions.SetSelectedChoice;export{SetSelectedChoice};var SetFinishFlag=quizSlice.actions.SetFinishFlag;export{SetFinishFlag};var SetIsCorrect=quizSlice.actions.SetIsCorrect;export{SetIsCorrect};var ResetQuiz=quizSlice.actions.ResetQuiz;export{ResetQuiz};var SetNewQuiz=quizSlice.actions.SetNewQuiz;export{SetNewQuiz};export var IsTraversing=function IsTraversing(state){return state.quiz.shownQuestion!==state.quiz.currentQuestion;};export default quizSlice.reducer;
